snippet: Nacer Bouhanni sprinted to victory on the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia, while Michael Matthews retained the overall leader’s pink jersey by 21 seconds over the former Tour de France winner Cadel Evans.
abstract: Nacer Bouhanni wins seventh stage of the Giro d'Italia, as Michael Matthews retains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Nacer Bouhanni sprinted to victory on the seventh stage of the Giro d’Italia, while Michael Matthews retained the overall leader’s pink jersey by 21 seconds over the former Tour de France winner Cadel Evans.
